item.title: 什么是独立思考？
item.description: 什么是独立思考？ 看到一篇短文 Independent thinking is the desire of a person to convince oneself that the information being presented is true or reasonable. This differs from critical thinking, which is the process used to collect and process information to arrive at a logical conclusion. 这篇文章说独立思考是一种意愿（
